Aug. 26, 1922 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class C)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class C) 520 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-c
None
Hallelujah Chorus [unknown arranger]
Peniel Farm, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK First running of Class C - this appears to have been an open class, attracting duplicate entries from both Classes A and B. This format continued until the early 1930s.
May 21, 2013, 1:16 p.m. Jan. 15, 2014, 3:13 p.m.

2 Kingswood Evangel J. E. Fidler
3 St. Austell Town Band J. M. Hinchcliffe
